articles.author: Written by Sakshi Verma
articles.title: Superfood Bajra: Know 5 benefits of eating millet in winters - India TV News
articles.description: Millet grain is widely eaten in India and other parts of Asia and Africa. It is a hardy crop that can grow in hot and dry conditions. Due to this it becomes an important food source for people living in arid and semi-arid areas.
articles.content: These days the government is promoting millet crops in our country. Moreover, eating this superfood in winter can be very fruitful for your body too. Food items made from millet are tasty as well as … [+2035 chars]
